TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlErrorCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Collects all errors generated by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is created by <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> to collect instances of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> class. SqlErrorCollection always contains at least one instance of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> class.
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> within the SqlErrorCollection collection.
[!CODE [Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int index);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Array"> to copy elements into.
The index from which to start copying into the parameter.
Docs.summary: Copies the elements of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"> collection into an <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"> to copy the elements into.
The index from which to start copying into the parameter.
Docs.summary: Copies the elements of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"> collection into a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection">, starting at the specified index.
Gets the number of errors in the collection.
Docs.value: The total number of errors in the collection.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Enumerators can be used to read the data in a collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the error to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Gets the error at the specified index.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError"> that contains the error at the specified index.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>.
Docs.value: `true` if access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection"> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.

Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>.
Docs.value: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
